CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.4.1, drugauthorizationnumb (35AN)
E2B (R3): G.k.3.1 Authorisation / Application Number Conformance: Optional Data Type: 35 AN OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.989.2.1.3.4 Value Allowed: Free text
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If relevant and known, the name of the holder should be provided with the authorization number in the country where the drug was obtained when the case report is sent to that country. These items apply to both applications and authorizations.
CustomField.label: Authorization/Application Number
